chart_description: The Disk I/O Bandwidth chart displays the amount of data read from and written to the disk per second, measured in KiB/s. This chart shows the overall performance of the storage device and can be useful for identifying bottlenecks and potential issues with the storage subsystem.

dimension_descriptions.reads: The amount of data read from the disk per second, measured in KiB/s. This value represents the rate at which the system is retrieving data from the storage device.
dimension_descriptions.writes: The amount of data written to the disk per second, measured in KiB/s. This value represents the rate at which the system is sending data to the storage device.
